nodes.text: The A-type Stiletto was designed to serve as a space superiority starfighter by Nubia Star Drives, Incorporated for an anonymous customer. The manufacturer later offered to sell copies of the highly personalized design to customers who could afford them.

The A-type Stiletto-class was a sleek needle-shaped fighter built around its two primary weapon systems: a highly accurate long-nosed laser cannon and a single-shot missile launcher. While the specialized missiles which the launcher fired were very accurate and highly lethal against starfighters, they could only be obtained on Nubia and were costly.
